name: Ruff Tuff Skies
description:
This is an entry for Ludum Dare 49.
A 48-hour game jam in which only one person is required to make a game from scratch. However, this is for the Jam of Ludum Dare, which takes on 72 hours instead. 

[ Entry on Ludum Dare ]

Pal wakes up to a disaster!
With no crew left after the storm, it's up to Pal to survive and make it to land.

How long can you keep up? Keep you and your ship running!
We want to make it to land!

CONTROLS:

  • Movement
    • WASD / Arrow Keys: Move around
    • Down: Buy from shop
    • Left Click: Use Weapon
    • Right Click: Use Hammer
    • Shift: Dash
    • Ctrl / Mid Click: Dodge
    • Space: Jump
      • Tap twice to use an aerial maneuver!

CREDITS: 

  • @fiaKaiera – Team Leader, Art, & Co-Programmer
  • @Wishdream – Main Programmer  & Sound
  • @YouFulca - Background Music

QUESTIONS: 
If you have any questions, feel free to ask from my Twitter: @fiaKaiera
